file.name: rest-openapi.yaml
file.content:
components:
    parameters:
        externalReferenceCodePathParam:
            in: path
            explode: false
            name: externalReferenceCode
            required: true
            schema:
                description:
                    The resource external reference code
                example: AB-34098-789-N
                minLength: 1
                type: string
            style: simple
        idPathParam:
            in: path
            explode: false
            name: id
            required: true
            schema:
                description:
                    The resource Id
                example: 30130
                format: int64
                minimum: 0
                type: integer
            style: simple
        pageQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: page
            required: false
            schema:
                type: integer
            style: form
        pageSizeQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: pageSize
            required: false
            schema:
                type: integer
            style: form
    responses:
        NotFound:
            content:
                application/json:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                application/xml:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
            description:
                The specified resource was not found
        UnauthorizedError:
            content:
                application/json:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                application/xml:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
            description:
                Authentication information is missing or invalid
    schemas:
        Discount:
            properties:
                accountGroups:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountAccountGroup"
                    type: array
                active:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                categories:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountCategory"
                    type: array
                couponCode:
                    example: SAVE20
                    type: string
                customFields:
                    additionalProperties: true
                    type: object
                displayDate:
                    format: date
                    type: string
                expirationDate:
                    format: date
                    type: string
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                limitationTimes:
                    example: 0
                    format: int32
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                limitationType:
                    example: unlimited
                    type: string
                maximumDiscountAmount:
                    example: 25
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                neverExpire:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                numberOfUse:
                    example: 5
                    format: int32
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                percentageLevel1:
                    example: 20
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                percentageLevel2:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                percentageLevel3:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                percentageLevel4:
                    example: 0
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                products:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountProduct"
                    type: array
                rules:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                    type: array
                target:
                    example: subtotal
                    type: string
                title:
                    example: 20% Off
                    type: string
                useCouponCode:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                usePercentage:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
            required:
                - limitationType
                - target
                - title
            type: object
        DiscountAccountGroup:
            properties:
                accountGroupExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: PAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                accountGroupId:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                discountExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: DAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                discountId:
                    example: 30324
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                id:
                    example: 30643
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
            type: object
        DiscountCategory:
            properties:
                categoryExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: PAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                categoryId:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                discountExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: DAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                discountId:
                    example: 30324
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                id:
                    example: 30643
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
            type: object
        DiscountProduct:
            properties:
                discountExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: DAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                discountId:
                    example: 30324
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                id:
                    example: 30643
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                productExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: PAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                productId:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
            type: object
        DiscountRule:
            properties:
                discountId:
                    example: 30324
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                id:
                    example: 30643
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                type:
                    example: cart-total
                    type: string
                typeSettings:
                    example: "22.50"
                    type: string
            required:
                - type
            type: object
        Error:
            properties:
                errorCode:
                    description:
                        Internal error code mapping
                    example: 996
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                errorDescription:
                    example: Unable to find currency. Currency code should be expressed with
                        3-letter ISO 4217 format.
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                message:
                    example: No CommerceCurrency exists with the key {groupId=41811, code=US
                        Dollar}
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                status:
                    description:
                        HTTP Status code
                    example: 404
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
            required:
                - errorCode
                - errorDescription
                - message
                - status
            type: object
        PriceEntry:
            properties:
                customFields:
                    additionalProperties: true
                    type: object
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                hasTierPrice:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                price:
                    example: 30130
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                priceListExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: PLAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                priceListId:
                    example: 20078
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                promoPrice:
                    example: 30130
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                sku:
                    example: BL500IC
                    type: string
                skuExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: CAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                skuId:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                tierPrices:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/TierPrice"
                    type: array
            required:
                - price
            type: object
        PriceList:
            properties:
                accountGroups:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/PriceListAccountGroup"
                    type: array
                active:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                catalogId:
                    example: 23130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                currencyCode:
                    example: EUR
                    type: string
                customFields:
                    additionalProperties: true
                    type: object
                displayDate:
                    format: date
                    type: string
                expirationDate:
                    format: date
                    type: string
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                name:
                    example: Laptops, Beverages
                    type: string
                neverExpire:
                    example: true
                    type: boolean
                priceEntries:
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/PriceEntry"
                    type: array
                priority:
                    example: 1.2
                    format: double
                    type: number
            required:
                - currencyCode
                - name
            type: object
        PriceListAccountGroup:
            properties:
                accountGroupExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: DAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                accountGroupId:
                    example: 30324
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                id:
                    example: 30643
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                order:
                    example: 1
                    format: int32
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                priceListExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: PAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                priceListId:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
            type: object
        TierPrice:
            properties:
                customFields:
                    additionalProperties: true
                    type: object
                externalReferenceCode:
                    example: AB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                id:
                    example: 31130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                minimumQuantity:
                    example: 5
                    format: int32
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                price:
                    example: 25
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
                priceEntryExternalReferenceCode:
                    example: CAB-34098-789-N
                    type: string
                priceEntryId:
                    example: 30130
                    format: int64
                    minimum: 0
                    type: integer
                promoPrice:
                    example: 20
                    format: bigdecimal
                    minimum: 0
                    type: number
            type: object
    securitySchemes:
        BasicAuth:
            scheme: basic
            type: http
        BearerAuth:
            scheme: bearer
            type: http
        OAuth2:
            flows:
                authorizationCode:
                    authorizationUrl: /oauth/authorize
                    scopes:
                        HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.admin: Grants access to admin operations
                        HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.read: Grants read access
                        HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.write: Grants write access
                    tokenUrl: /oauth/token
            type: oauth2
info:
    contact:
        email: team-commerce@liferay.com
        name: Commerce Team
    description:
        Liferay Commerce Admin Pricing API
    title: Liferay Commerce Admin Pricing API
    version: v1.0
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
    /discount/by-externalReferenceCode/{externalReferenceCode}/discountRules/:
        get:
            operationId: getDiscountByExternalReferenceCodeDiscountRulesPage
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  explode: false
                  name: externalReferenceCode
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      description:
                          The resource external reference code
                      example: AB-34098-789-N
                      minLength: 1
                      type: string
                  style: simple
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: page
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                  style: form
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: pageSize
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                  style: form
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                                type: array
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                                type: array
                    description:
                        Successful operation
                400:
                    description:
                        Invalid input
                401:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
                404:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        The specified resource was not found
                500:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Unexpected error
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.read
            summary: Gets a list of Discount Rule related to a Discount.
            tags:
                - DiscountRule
        post:
            operationId: postDiscountByExternalReferenceCodeDiscountRule
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  explode: false
                  name: externalReferenceCode
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      description:
                          The resource external reference code
                      example: AB-34098-789-N
                      minLength: 1
                      type: string
                  style: simple
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                    application/xml:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                required: true
            responses:
                201:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                    description:
                        Created
                202:
                    description:
                        Async
                204:
                    description:
                        Updated
                400:
                    description:
                        Invalid input
                401:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
                404:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        The specified resource was not found
                500:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Unexpected error
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.write
            summary: Creates or Updates a Discount Rule.
            tags:
                - DiscountRule
    /discountAccountGroups/{id}:
        delete:
            operationId: deleteDiscountAccountGroup
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  explode: false
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      description:
                          The resource Id
                      example: 30130
                      format: int64
                      minimum: 0
                      type: integer
                  style: simple
            responses:
                204:
                    description:
                        No content
                401:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.write
            summary: Deletes a Discount Account Group by ID.
            tags:
                - DiscountAccountGroup
    /discountCategories/{id}:
        delete:
            operationId: deleteDiscountCategory
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  explode: false
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      description:
                          The resource Id
                      example: 30130
                      format: int64
                      minimum: 0
                      type: integer
                  style: simple
            responses:
                204:
                    description:
                        No content
                401:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.write
            summary: Deletes a Discount Category by ID.
            tags:
                - DiscountCategory
    /discountProducts/{id}:
        delete:
            operationId: deleteDiscountProduct
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  explode: false
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      description:
                          The resource Id
                      example: 30130
                      format: int64
                      minimum: 0
                      type: integer
                  style: simple
            responses:
                204:
                    description:
                        No content
                401:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.write
            summary: Deletes a Discount Product by ID.
            tags:
                - DiscountProduct
    /discountRules/{id}:
        delete:
            operationId: deleteDiscountRule
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  explode: false
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      description:
                          The resource Id
                      example: 30130
                      format: int64
                      minimum: 0
                      type: integer
                  style: simple
            responses:
                204:
                    description:
                        No content
                401:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.write
            summary: Deletes a Discount Rule by ID.
            tags:
                - DiscountRule
        get:
            operationId: getDiscountRule
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  explode: false
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      description:
                          The resource Id
                      example: 30130
                      format: int64
                      minimum: 0
                      type: integer
                  style: simple
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                    description:
                        Successful operation
                400:
                    description:
                        Invalid input
                401:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
                404:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        The specified resource was not found
                500:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Unexpected error
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.read
            summary: Gets a Discount Rule by ID.
            tags:
                - DiscountRule
        patch:
            operationId: patchDiscountRule
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  explode: false
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      description:
                          The resource Id
                      example: 30130
                      format: int64
                      minimum: 0
                      type: integer
                  style: simple
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                    application/xml:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountRule"
                required: true
            responses:
                201:
                    description:
                        Created
                202:
                    description:
                        Async
                400:
                    description:
                        Invalid input
                401:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
                404:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        The specified resource was not found
                500:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Unexpected error
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.write
            summary: Updates a Discount Rule by ID.
            tags:
                - DiscountRule
    /discounts/:
        get:
            operationId: getDiscountsPage
            parameters:
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: page
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                  style: form
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: pageSize
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                  style: form
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/Discount"
                                type: array
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/Discount"
                                type: array
                    description:
                        Successful operation
                401:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
                404:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        The specified resource was not found
                500:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Unexpected error
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.read
            summary: Gets a list of Discount.
            tags:
                - Discount
        post:
            operationId: postDiscount
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Discount"
                    application/xml:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Discount"
                required: true
            responses:
                201:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Discount"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Discount"
                    description:
                        Created
                202:
                    description:
                        Async
                204:
                    description:
                        Updated
                400:
                    description:
                        Invalid input
                401:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
                404:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        The specified resource was not found
                500:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Unexpected error
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - HeadlessCommerceAdminPricing.write
            summary: Creates or Updates a Discount.
            tags:
                - Discount
    /discounts/by-externalReferenceCode/{externalReferenceCode}/discountAccountGroups/:
        get:
            operationId: getDiscountByExternalReferenceCodeDiscountAccountGroupsPage
            parameters:
                - in: path
                  explode: false
                  name: externalReferenceCode
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      description:
                          The resource external reference code
                      example: AB-34098-789-N
                      minLength: 1
                      type: string
                  style: simple
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: page
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                  style: form
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: pageSize
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                  style: form
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/DiscountAccountGroup"

servers:
    - description:
          Liferay Commerce API server
      url: https://commerce.{environment}.liferay.com/commerce-admin-pricing/{basePath}
      variables:
          basePath:
              default: v1.0
          environment:
              default: api
              enum:
                  - api
                  - api.dev
                  - api.uat
    - description:
          Liferay Commerce Local Development (Hosts file)
      url: "{protocol}://{host}:{port}/o/commerce-admin-pricing/{basePath}"
      variables:
          basePath:
              default: v1.0
          host:
              default: test.dev
          port:
              default: "8080"
              enum:
                  - "443"
                  - "8080"
                  - "8443"
          protocol:
              default: http
              enum:
                  - http
                  - https
    - description:
          Liferay Commerce Local Development with Ngrok
      url: "{protocol}://{host}.ngrok.io/o/commerce-admin-pricing/{basePath}"
      variables:
          basePath:
              default: v1.0
          host:
              default: commerce
          protocol:
              default: http
              enum:
                  - http
                  - https
    - description:
          SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
      url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/liferay6/commerce-admin-pricing/v1.0
    - description:
          SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
      url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/liferayinc/commerce-admin-pricing/v1.0
